title: Deals: Samsung Wireless Charger Trio hits $62, Google Nest Wifi Mesh Router $119, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung’s official Wireless Charger Trio at $62. That’s alongside the Google Nest Wifi Mesh Router at $119 and an ongoing Chromecast with Google TV price cut. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Wireless Charger Trio hits $62, Google Nest Wifi Mesh Router $119, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung Wireless Charger Trio has fallen to $62 following a rare Amazon discount alongside a new Google Nest Wifi router low.
